short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is used to generate email body using Chat GPT API. It needs your OpenAI API key.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Create email content for your emails using Chat GPT API. Adirani DS Gmail GPT extension (ARDS Gmail GPT Extension) is an amazing tool that activates whenever your open your Gmail inbox. 

To know more about our company, visit https://adiranids.com

It needs your OpenAI key. You can get your key from here https://platform.openai.com/account/api-keys. Don't worry, we won't take or store your API keys anywhere on our server. It is stored in your browser's localstorage so you can always delete it from there whenever you want.

The usage of the extension is pretty straightforward. Once installed you should see the extension activated and in your Gmail's text box where your write email, you should see a blue button saying "Generate using GPT".

You need to insert the prompt in following method  
[prompt: "your prompt text"]. In the double quotes enter your prompt and click the blue button.

Example: 
[prompt: "Write a reply email to this 'I won't be available tomorrow, but Friday works, are you happy with that time?' "]  

Consider like how would you type to Chat GPT, you need to follow the similar method of prompts.
